channel.title: alter series on SiriDB documentation
channel.description: Recent content in alter series on SiriDB documentation

item.title: tag
item.description: Examples # Tag series alter series 'my-series-001', 'my-series-002' tag `my-series` # Another tag example alter series /linux.*/ where type == float tag `linux-float`

item.title: untag
item.description: Examples # Untag series alter series 'my-series-001', 'my-series-002' untag `my-series`
